Secure password Which of these is the best practice for creating a secure password? Use common words separated by hyphens Use a long random string with letters, numbers, and symbols Always use the same password for every account Change your password every 2 years
What is phishing? What is the correct definition of phishing? Sending fraudulent emails to obtain sensitive data Physical attack on a company server Using ransomware to encrypt files Intercepting satellite communications
Brute Force In a brute-force attack, what does the attacker do? Intercept emails Systematically try all password combinations Install a hardware keylogger Use a virus to encrypt files
Public Wi-Fi What is the main risk when connecting to an unsecured public Wi-Fi network? Excessive battery drain Traffic interception by malicious actors Too high connection speed Forced automatic updates
Two-factor authentication What is the main benefit of two-factor authentication (2FA)? Faster access to services Greater security by requiring two different credentials Reduces the space taken by passwords Increases connection speed
Data backup What is the most reliable method to protect data from accidental loss? Save everything on the desktop Regularly back up to an external device and the cloud Leave data on the original device Use only public USB drives
Social engineering What is the main technique used in social engineering? Exploiting network vulnerabilities Psychologically manipulating the victim Encrypting data with ransomware Intercepting network packets
Security patch Why is it important to promptly install security patches? To improve system performance To fix known vulnerabilities before they are exploited To increase free disk space To change the user interface
DDoS attack What characterizes a DDoS attack? Compromising a single host Spreading spyware via email Saturating bandwidth with numerous requests Encrypting the user’s files
VPN and privacy A VPN (Virtual Private Network) is mainly used to: Speed up the internet connection Create an encrypted tunnel to protect traffic Automatically block all ads Increase the device’s RAM
